summary: Oblivion arena substitute; Fully functional gladiator arena like oblivion! enemies get harder as you work your way up to grand champion.
descriptionHtml:
much like the one in oblivion:
credited to partly the Grotto team. 

fully functional gladiator Arena; an underground settlement near Falkreath, inside is the Arena, a place where you can fight against other people to the death for gold. With this Plugin you will experience first hand revenge and a struggling community in need of help! The Plugin also adds a new player home, a new Rune spell, a new enemy, new weapons and the challenging Arena where you can de-stress after a long day of Dragon-hunting! Good Luck Dovahkiin\'s and remember to report bugs, like, comment and subscribe! 
Remember to endorse!

Responses (in comments) \"Finished the mod! REALLY GREAT mod. I like the little touches you added in the tomb inscriptions.Will endorse when 1 hour limit is up.\"

\"Probably best mod i have downloaded, I\'m surprised that bethesda did not add an arena to skyrim in the first place, thanks for filling the gap!\"


Includes: a bar, smithing area, dungeon, training area with npcs, champions room, arena, small cabin.

Add your own images if you can, thanks

Recomendations: DON\'T use any console commands, as they interfere with quest progression.
: Use as few mods as possible as multiple mods may and often clash wth each other.
author: DodgeBullets
